info.name: Customer Service API Tests
info.description: Test suite for all Customer Service API endpoints.

item.name: Clients
item.description: Documentation and tests for the Customer Service API.

request.description:
Returns a list of all clients in the CS Client database.

For internal silo use only.

response.name: Get All Clients - 200 OK

item.name: Check Product S00001 Exists and Is Sold (From Inventory)

request.description: Checks that product with serial number, S00001, exists and has a status of sold from inventory's API so that we can use it in our testing.
